strings.RRP_ITEM_ADRFRENZY_PICKUP: Gain speed on kill and on getting hit
strings.RRP_ITEM_ADRFRENZY_DESC: On kill, gain <style=cIsUtility>{0}% sprint speed</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per stack)</style>  for {2} seconds. On getting hit, gain <style=cIsUtility>{3}% speed</style> <style=cStack>(+{4}% per stack)</style> for {5} seconds. <style=cDeath>Sacrifices Energy Drink.</style>
strings.RRP_ITEM_AGROINSECT_DESC: After getting hurt, inflict a debuff for {0} seconds that causes your insect to spit at enemies for<style=cIsDamage> {1}% total damage</style><style=cStack> (+{1}% total damage per stack)</style>; <style=cDeath>Sacrifices Introspective Insect.</style>
strings.RRP_ITEM_FHEMORRHAGE_DESC: {0}% chance on hit to apply Hemorrhage 1 time <style=cStack>(+1 time per stack)</style> with a <style=cIsDamage>{1}% damage multiplier</style> over {2} seconds. <style=cDeath>Sacrifices a combination of Tri-Tip Dagger and Four Dimensional Dagger.</style>
strings.RRP_ITEM_PREDATORY_PICKUP: Chance on hit to unleash vicious power
strings.RRP_ITEM_PREDATORY_DESC: Grants a {8}% chance on hit and an {9}% chance on kill to grant a <style=cDeath>predatory rush</style>, giving <style=cIsHealing>{0} armor</style> <style=cStack>(+{0} per stack)</style>, <style=cIsDamage>{1}% base damage</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% per stack)</style>, <style=cIsUtility>{2}% cooldown reduction</style> <style=cStack>(+{2}% per stack)</style> stacking up to 50%, <style=cIsUtility>{3}% jump force</style>, <style=cIsDamage>{4}% crit damage</style> <style=cStack>(+{4}% per stack)</style>, and <style=cIsDamage>{5}% crit chance</style> for {6} seconds <style=cStack>(+{7} seconds per stack)</style>. <style=cDeath>Sacrifices Predatory Insincts.</style>
